newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products-Gasoline steady, arb near feasible.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products-Gasoline steady, arb near feasible.

text.p: NWE oil products were mostly unchanged on Wednesday, traders said.
Gasoline was stable and dealers said arbitrage opportunities would be feasible with a further drop in European prices by a couple of dollars.
Naphtha was also little changed, under pressure from poor demand and good supply.
Gas oil was steady to soft in quiet trade with good supplies keeping buyers relaxed.
Early July diesel cargo premiums were assessed around July IPE +$6/+$6.50. Amsterdam/Rotterdam lifting barges were valued around July screen evens in late business.

High sulphur barges were steady to a shade firmer trading between $82 and $83.50 fob ARA for June material while a small volume of July barges were done at $84. But traders said demand was not very good.
High sulphur cargoes were talking steady after trading on Tuesday at $81 cif.
